product_name: Pearl Izumi Jr. Quest Bike Shorts - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The hardworking Pearl Izumi Jr. Quest Bike Shorts for kids are comfortable and have a lightly padded chamois sized for the young rider. Stretch polyester blend fabric wicks moisture away from the body so kids stay cool; 4-panel construction gives a contoured fit. Reflective trim enhances visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The hardworking Pearl Izumi Jr. Quest Bike Shorts for kids are comfortable and have a lightly padded chamois sized for the young rider.
